newsitem.title: USA: Eltrax Systems to acquire modem maker.
newsitem.headline: Eltrax Systems to acquire modem maker.

text.p: Eltrax Systems Inc said Friday it signed a letter of intent to acquire the business and assets of the MST operating division of MRK Technologies of Cleveland.
MST markets wide area network hardware including modems, multiplexers and voice and data transmission devices.

Terms of the transaction, expected to close by January 31, 1997, were not disclosed. Eltrax said MST said that its unaudited sales for 1996 are expected to be about $9 million with a contribution margin (earnings before general and administrative expenses) of about $1 million.
"MST will integrate easily within our ANS subsidiary and contribute positively to our overall profitability," said Eltrax president Mack Traynor III in a statement.
